title: Prospect for New Suite Owners
description: A sales manager wants to identify potential corporate clients to target for unsold luxury suites.

tasks.description: Search a business database for large companies headquartered in the local area.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a list of potential corporate clients.

tasks.description: Cross-reference the list against the current and past suite holder list to identify new prospects.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent filters out existing clients to create a list of new targets.

tasks.description: Assign the new prospects to sales representatives to begin outreach.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent divides the prospect list and assigns them to the sales team in the CRM.
